job.title: Software Developer/Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtposition summaryltstronggtltpgtltpgtif you are a software developerengineer who enjoys problem solving enhancing existing products and creating new ones vistage has an opportunity for you as a valued member of a small geographically distributed team you will make significant meaningful contributions to our member facing platform ampnbspthis position reports to the manager software engineering ltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtthe companyltstronggtltpgtltpgtvistage is the worlds largest ceo coaching and peer advisory organization for small and midsize business smb leaders we offer the most effective approach for smb enterprises to achieve better results and grow faster as well as for smb leaders to maximize their impactampnbspltpgtltpgtthe members we serve are ceos owners and executives of smb organizations located across the us and in counties around the worldampnbspthese smb executives typically spend a day or more with vistage every month to immerse themselves in our comprehensive platform for making better decisions getting better results and becoming better leaders our platform features three core elements valuable perspectives from a trusted group of peers professional guidance and meeting facilitation from an accomplished business leader the chair and deep insights from subject matter expertsltpgtltpgtvistage was founded more than years ago and weve grown every year since then by innovating to stay on the cuttingedge of business and being relentless in delivering value to our membersampnbspour success is demonstrated by the fact that vistage member companies grow times faster than nonvistage peer companiesampnbsplearn more about us at wwwvistagecomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtvistage employee lifeltstronggtltpgtltpgtvistages success is anchored by a unique culture which reinforces employee commitment to the vistage mission it is a spirit of collective success and achievement which is also reflected in our workplaceampnbspheres a sample of the employee experience that helps drive our successltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspwelcome to our homeltstronggtampnbspour us headquarters sits in the heart of san diegos utc areaampnbspit features an open modern aesthetic with lots of collaboration spaces free lattes and kombucha on tapampnbspfrom our san diego base we collaborate with colleagues based across the country and around the worldltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspwe sweat the detailsltstronggtampnbspour onsite gym is decked out with peloton bikes a mirror workout system and plenty of other equipment to keep your workout challenging and freshampnbsponsite yoga classes chair massages and smoothie days also help to keep us focused and healthyltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspwe invest in your careerltstronggtampnbspeach employee has an actionable career progression plan developed through individual collaboration with their managerampnbspwe focus on promoting from within and employee progression plans are complemented by allstaff development days held in our stateoftheart learning center as well as access to tons of individualized development resources and a tuition reimbursement programltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspwe invest in youltstronggtampnbspour employee benefits program is one of the most generous youll findampnbspfullypaid healthcare is provided for employees through anthem blue cross along with access to dental vision and life insurance coverageampnbsptake care of your financial future with k matching funds eligibility after your first month as an employee and utilize the free individual investment counseling we provide to help you grow the money youve savedampnbspyoull also start with days of paid time off per year to allow you to relax and recharge employees receive additional annual paid days off based on tenureltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspwe keep it funltstronggtampnbspwhether youre enjoying our summer baseball outing unwinding during an employee happy hour or toasting your coworkers at our epic annual holiday party youll see that we take having fun as seriously as helping our members succeedampnbspthe office vibe is business casual with flexible schedules along with freedom to work from home in bunny slippers if thats your thingampnbspwe value mutual respect and laughter we hate stiff formalityampnbspyoull have regular access to vistage executivesour ceo even buys everyone doughnuts several times a year to fuel his informal employee chatsampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtvistages culture and sense of mission drives employee loyalty more than half of our staff has been with the company for five years or longerampnbspare you ready to start your vistage
